name: Chipotlemon
description:
Chipotlemon is a basic Pokemon spoof using the unreleased generation 2 sprites. Developed for GBC Game Engines III.

Github Link:

**We do not own the rights to any of the assets used. The purpose of this game is entirely educational**

How to Play:

Press WASD to or the ARROW KEYS to WALK.

Press ESCAPE or P to PAUSE the game and open your PAUSE MENU.

Enter large patches of GRASS for a chance to BATTLE a wild CHIPOTLEMON.

Defeat the wild CHIPOTLEMON to add it to your PARTY.

You can have up to 6 CHIPOTLEMON in your PARTY at once.

Different CHIPOTLEMON can be found in different areas.

You can view your PARTY any time from either the PAUSE MENU or while in BATTLE.

The first CHIPOTLEMON in your PARTY will be the one used in BATTLE.

In your party menu while not in BATTLE, select a CHIPOTLEMON then a different one to SWAP their positions.

While in BATTLE, selecting a different CHIPOTLEMON in your party will send them into the BATTLE.

Highlight over your CHIPOTLEMON to view their STATS or select a MOVE to view its STATS.

Each CHIPOTLEMON and each ATTACK has a TYPE.

Some TYPES are more EFFECTIVE against certain other TYPES.

View the TYPE EFFECTIVENESS CHART at any time from the MAIN MENU or the PAUSE MENU.
